rows.label: qev092904_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeah, impressive.
That was some brilliant skill.

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0020
rows.name:
Alright, now it's my turn.
Let's start the investigation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0030
rows.name:
First, I'll investigate the base of the ring
and look for data plug consoles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0040
rows.name:
If things go well, I might be able to salvage
the activity log of this mysterious ring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0050
rows.name:
For now[ST:wide ]—
Finding two spots should be enough, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0060
rows.name: In the meantime, can I count on you to handle the native creatures again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0090
rows.name:
Haha, thanks for the obvious reply.
I feel safe entrusting my life to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0100
rows.name:
Alright then, investigation start!
Continuing on, I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0130
rows.name:
Errrr... That could be tricky.
I don't have much to hand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0145
rows.name:
Instead, how about I recite
a poem I wrote for you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092904_MSG0150
rows.name:
I'll bestow upon you the crystallization of my intellect and sensitivity!
You'll be happy with that, right?[ST:wait ]
